name: Levies at War
description:
Levies at war is a first-person strategy game where you have to conquer the enemy until your reach the flag with a crown. You can choose to control the army of faction or let the AI do it. The army AI that will change its aggression depending on the situation that's in it. Moral is a mechanic that modifies how many soldiers spawn, it changes +10 when you capture a flag and a -10 when one of your flags is captured

MULTIPLAYER

You can play multiplayer on lan or over the internet.

To play on lan you just to introduce the ipv4 of the host

To play online you have to port forward with the port 1300
